name: Super Hero
overview: Are you a SUPERHERO? Can you defeat the GUARDIANS with your magical returning Warhammer, Boots of Power, ESP and Teleportation Activators. You'd better be a SUPERHERO else you'll end up in the Dead-Zone!!! This 3D game blows the others away - SuperHero is the best 3D game we've ever seen - a must for any real games player. Wanna be a SUPERHERO? Then this is the game for you! Fate has cast you in the role of an immortal, a superhero. To break the long, monotonous days, the gods and super heroes have taken to giving each other complex puzzles to solve. Today, it's your turn to play the game, and for the very highest stakes - you MUST perform well, for all the other deities are watching you from above, ready to strip you of your immortality and status if you fail in your quest! Luckily Venus, the goddess of love, feels sympathetic and has hidden some useful objects in some of the rooms - find these and your task will become a lot easier...
